name: Wool Adventure - Game Pratic 2020
description:
Game created during Game Pratic' 2020

Wool Adventure is an adventure platform game where you play as a little wool ball, that throw itself inside the maze of machines.

Your goal is to follow the path to be cut in smaller pieces and cleaned from your dirt and trashes and then exit the machine being clean and finely cut.

This game was created with the theme : "batteur ouvreur"

Romain Giner - Sound Designer / Level Designer / Programmer

Léo Antoine - Programmer

Chloé  Zorzopian - 2D Artist / VFX Artist

Tristan  Roux - 2D Artist
